name: Stan A.
text: Good for meals other than pizza. Last time I was visiting I've ordered a large pizza and ended up waiting for 30 minutes inside, I kid you not. I think one of the cooks must've been new or something. But I've had positive experiences with sandwiches there...

name: Lisa M
text: Excellent pizza. But you have to prefer your pizza with lots of Parmesan cheese to absolutely love it.

name: Joseph Bijan
text: This is my favorite papa ginos location. The staff is fantastic.  There's always going to be instances where there will be problems in the food industry but that doesn't mean this is a bad place. …More

name: Tony z
text: I've been here a few times both sitting in, taking out and delivery. Had my first date with my girlfriend here. Staff is a bit quiet which isn't exactly terrible. The reward card system is too difficult to make use of during a visit to …More

name: Pat Canny
text: Spacious location. Great for groups with small kids.

name: PamelaroseVest
text: Good old fashion pizza thin like italiano mm good

name: Joe Carbone
text: The place was neat and clean but the food was just OK, nothing to brag about.

name: Ty Wolf
text: The employees are lazy. We came on a wed with friends for the All you can eat special. It took 15 min for our first order to come out with the wrong pizza. And even longer for the next order. The lady at the register was very rude and you …More

name: Ashley memories
text: The patriots deal was a good offer an the food was great too. Would do it again!

name: D Bean
text: I don't eat at Papa Gino's that often and I probably won't get at this one rver again. It was the only place open and offorable restaurant one night I was in that àrea. I ordered a papa platter and it took 20 minutes to get my order. When I …More

name: steven dennis
text: Always friendly and helpful. Pick up or delivery. It's a good local pizza joint.

name: Wendy Mac Kay
text: This location was faster in Melrose than the Malden location. Air conditioner perfect. Food was HOT AND DELICIOUS.

name: Phil Goveia
text: I always enjoy your pizza! Thank you!

name: Chris Ford
text: Good delivery service e

name: michael oconnor
text: Nothing better but a papa gino's pizza

name: sarah La Bella
text: Nothing like being robbed for $30 for a lg pizza and a small cheesey bread stick... Yes that's right $30 for ONE PIZZA AND A SIDE!!! I waited over 45 minutes for this... But if I had made the exact same order online rather than order via …More

name: Deb duca
text: Supposed to be a quick bite just 2 slices of cheese pizza and took soooo long. And isn't that cheap. So to compare this place with the other pizza places in main St Melrose isn't fair. But the staff are friendly and plenty of parking spot.

name: Denise Caughey
text: Love the food and the people who work there are very friendly and always willing to make sure your satified. :)

name: Scott Bird
text: Great pizza. Super nice staff.

name: Donovan Lafontaine
text: Service is excellent, pizza is okay

name: Edwin Andrews
text: Staff very friendly.  Food average.

name: haley ward
text: I ordered a lg pizza and mozzarella stick  about an hour and a half ago on a credit card. Called back and they keep putting me on hold. I'm starving!!!!!!!! Where's my pizza

name: Olena K
text: I order here all the time it's close and has awesome pizza!

name: Tommie Bethune
text: The staff here is great, they have a lot patience and are very friendly. We will continue to come here for years to come.

name: Arthur Abelowitz
text: Service was very slow. Food marginal. This is not the Papa Gino's I used to like.

name: Myles Johnson
text: Pizza. Hot and tasty.

name: Tom Gori
text: Always cold in here. Couldn't eat in. Had to take to go.

name: Christian Snook
text: Good pizza and kid friendly.
